nodes.text: A CoMar Tri-Tracker chip was a type of computer chip used in military-grade targeting computers. By the time of the Cold War, they were used primarily in older-model devices, such as the targeting computer that ran the Colossus platform's defense turbolasers. Due to being military hardware, they were considered rare and expensive for any civilians looking for them.

CoMar Tri-Tracker chips first appeared in "Synara's Score", a 2018 episode of the animated television series Star Wars Resistance. In Star Wars Legends, CoMar was known for manufacturing the G-003 Tri-Tracker.
